ComicInfo.Title: Darkness Falls: The Death of Jackie Estacado Part 1; Adelphia
ComicInfo.Summary:
DARKNESS FALLS IN WITCHBLADE’S 19TH ANNIVERSARY! In another life Jackie Estacado was Sara Pezzini’s lover and the father of her child. Now he has used the power of the Darkness to endanger the whole of human existence and only the Witchblade can stop him. Here at last is the untold story...the Death Of Jackie Estacado!
Features two stories:
-"Darkness Falls: The Death of Jackie Estacado Part 1" (by David Hine and Gabriel Rearte): Sara Pezzini goes to Jackie Estocado's mansion to confront the Darkness bearer, but ends up facing her daughter who seems to be less than human.
-"Adelphia" (by Ryan Cady and Phillip Sevy): Patience, the Magdalena, returns to her old convent to aid a friend, only to discover that the situation is far worse than she thought.
